identity.description:
Generates a structured JSON metadata template from ToolUniverse configurations.

Generates a JSON structure with the metadata of a tool in ToolUniverse, given the JSON configuration of the tool.

tool_config.description: JSON string of the tool configuration to extract metadata from

tool_type_mappings.description: A mapping from a simplified toolType to a list of tool_config.type that fall under the toolType

purpose.model:
SentenceTransformer(
  (0): Transformer({'max_seq_length': 4096, 'do_lower_case': False, 'architecture': 'BertModel'})
  (1): Pooling({'word_embedding_dimension': 384, 'pooling_mode_cls_token': False, 'pooling_mode_mean_tokens': True, 'pooling_mode_max_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_mean_sqrt_len_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_weightedmean_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_lasttoken': False, 'include_prompt': True})
  (2): Normalize()
)
